articles.author: Sasha Rogelberg
articles.title: Trump’s bid to add cane sugar to Coke would cost America thousands of agricultural jobs, trade group warns - Fortune
articles.description: Agricultural industry leaders fear a push away from corn syrup could disrupt production of the U.S.’s largest crop.
articles.content: U.S. corn producers are sounding the alarm on President Donald Trumps efforts to switch Coca-Cola products away from using corn syrup in favor of cane sugar, claiming the change will wreak havoc on t… [+6267 chars]
